exits.name: Main Click Through
exits.description: Triggers when the user clicks anywhere within the ad except for the video player controls.

trackers.name: CTA Button Click
trackers.description: Fires when the user clicks the Call to Action Button

trackers.name: Headline Click
trackers.description: Fires when the headline text is clicked.

trackers.name: Body Copy Click
trackers.description: Fires when the body copy text is clicked.

trackers.name: Video Player Click
trackers.description: Fires When the Video Player is Clicked

trackers.name: Logo Click
trackers.description: Fires when the logo is clicked.
